title: Lasting Power of Attorney and Wills - what are they and why do they matter?

content.text: The session will focus on lasting power of attorney and wills. The rules differ in England, Scotland and Northern Ireland so please ensure you join the correct session.
These sessions will offer a great source of information and advice to those wanting to know more. The sessions will be interactive with a chance to get all your questions answered.
